name: REAPER Project File
summary: Learn about .RPP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: RPP files are stored using a plain-text markup language, and can be edited using any text editor.

description: Project file created by REAPER, a program used for recording, editing, mixing, and mastering music; contains information about tracks and their settings; used for saving and loading project information.
